description:
Mini is tied up in the back of Euro’s speeding truck, kidnapped and desperate, when the truck’s failing motor strands them in the remote, sun scorched hills. Their situation looks up when they happen upon a secluded garage run by two beautiful, friendly women. But, as our boys are about to learn, good fortune is often short lived.
The guys wake up tied, hooded and helpless, their cocks stretched as the two sadistic women interrogate, kick, stomp, smother, torment and tease their resistant captives.
Hard labor follows, starting with plugs in the hobbled bitch-boys’ asses, canes, and ridiculous demands as the women relax and splash cool water on their naked bodies. Sweating and filthy under the hot sun, the men struggle as they are dunked in dirty barrel water, talked down to, overpowered and humiliated.
Fed up with their insubordinate attitudes, the women teach them the meaning of obedience and humility as they brutally fuck their asses in a very hot two girl strap-on scene. Ridden hard and put away wet, the boys are left to twist in the sunset as the ladies plot their next day’s work…
title: "The Ranch", Part 1
